projects.name: Recipebook
projects.description: Spring boot project backed by mySQL. This application allows users to search, discover and save their favourite recipes. Personalized account creation and profile editing options.

projects.name: Webshop
projects.description: React project backed by Firebase real-time database. Simple webshop styled with tailwind. As a user you are able to add products to the cart and purchase products.

projects.name: Portfolio v1
projects.description: This was one of my first projects ever created which showcase a portfolio of my work.

projects.name: Flickr
projects.description: This project is a flickr clone which is a image service where you can upload and see other people's images. Flickr's own API and search functions with filter.

projects.name: Weather Website
projects.description: Weather web-application created in Java with Apache Tomcat as webserver. We used JSP to show the data on a static website and fetched data from https://openweathermap.org. User can search for any country and get the weather report from each country.

projects.name: Calendar
projects.description: Desktop-application made with Java and Swing. Simple week-calendar where the user can add and remove events on the calendar.

projects.name: Calendar
projects.description: Desktop-application made with Java and Swing. Simple week-calendar where the user can add and remove events on the calendar.
